appName: XRWorkout Free to Play VR Fitness
displayName: XRWorkout Free to Play VR Fitness
display_name: XRWorkout Free to Play VR Fitness
display_long_description:
**Sprint. Squat. Jump. Box. Balance. Lift. Transform.**

Unleash your fitness potential through functional full-body movement in mixed reality or full immersion

🔥 **Controller-Free Freedom**

Functional movements require full freedom. Enjoy our hands-free, controller-less magic, delivering the most immersive and dynamic full-body workout in virtual reality

[media]

💪 **High-Intensity Workouts even with Weights**

Set the game to adapt to your fitness level, and incorporating dynamic weight exercises to build strength and endurance. Easily progress from beginner to beast mode with no ceiling or plateau

❤️ **Heart Rate-Controlled Biofeedback**

Optimize your workout with real-time heart rate monitoring. Our biofeedback system can dynamically adjust exercise difficulty based on your heart rate, ensuring you stay in the ideal intensity zone for maximum results and safety

🦶 **Precision Foot Tracking for Balance**

Master balance and stability with advanced foot tracking for exercises that never get boring

🌍 **Immersive & Social Multiplayer**

Connect globally! Compete or collaborate with friends in real-time

[media]

🎨 **Shareable Environments**

Choose from existing stunning immersive worlds or craft your own unique environments.

[media]

🏆 **Create & Share Challenges**

Design personalized workout challenges  and share them with the world to compete on global leaderboards

[media]

**Happy. Healthy. Connected. Global.**

Join the movement. Power up your fitness journey with XRWorkout. Start today!
